alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Oglala Lakota County through 415 PM MDT... At 345 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms producing a landspout along a line extending from 5 miles west of Manderson to 2 miles southeast of Prairie Winds Casino. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manderson, South Lakeside and Loneman. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
